item.description: The very idea of having doctors write prescriptions for money off energy bills is bizarre. That the Treasury are flying the kite in a national paper is madness. It all just adds to the idea that the UK is teetering on the brink of breakdown. [DOC BILL HELP PLAN The Sun](https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/19569772/doctors-money-prescription-energy-bills/ “DOC BILL HELP PLAN, The Sun)
I can’t remember how long I’ve been trying to buy one. Now it’s here, I’m almost scared to open it.
Currently in the nesting phase of holiday gestation; tidying and organising everything to within an inch of its life.
I’m not sure exactly how an mRNA vaccine works, but having had my booster yesterday I spent most of today asleep or feeling awful. Then, since five, I’ve felt absolutely great.
The combination of ambiguous phrasing and anonymous initials makes me wonder what they did in those ‘happy hours’. (As well as making me very fond of Mrs Macfarlane.)

I’ve just spent an age tinkering with Github Actions and Pages to automate building a Hugo site. Something I imagine many people would do in moments, but there’s a real sense joy in accomplishing even something that simple.

As a sporadic, and not very good, photographer, it’s nice to get a picture used by the BBC for an article. Not a massive news story, and I think Grimsby has far bigger problems than the clock, but nice for the ego.
I’m coming to the conclusion that all there is to be found at the intersection of iOS and iPadOS 15 and iCloud is a horrible buggy mess.
